text: Chloropterus versicolor is a species of beetle in the leaf beetle family, subfamily Eumolpinae. It is distributed in Ukraine, southern European Russia, Turkey, Azerbaijan, Kazakhstan and Turkmenistan. It was first described as Heterocnemis versicolor by Ferdinand Morawitz in 1860. ==References== Category:Eumolpinae Category:Beetles described in 1860 Category:Beetles of Europe Category:Beetles of Asia
title: Chloropterus versicolor
